newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 4 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 4 PM.

text.p: * President Emil Constantinescu met Emperor Akihito during his five-day visit to Japan and held a news conference to call on Japanese investors to put their money into Romania.

* The extraordinary session of Romania's upper house of parliament, the Senate, closed without a vote on amendments to a 1991 land restitution law. Senators from the ruling coalition failed to show up in sufficient number to ensure passage.
* The leadership of the ruling National Peasant Party said it will punish senators who were missing from Tuesday's session without a good reason.
* Ex-president Ion Iliescu criticised amendments to the land restitution law saying it allowed large land properties, and therefore created the social category of "land barons".
